description: Formal specification for establishing, implementing, maintaining, and continually improving an Information Security Management System (ISMS).
coverage: Information Security Management (ISMS), CIA Triad, Governance, Controls (Annex A)
applicable_areas: Global, all types and sizes of organizations seeking certification.

description: Former certified standard for ISMS. Replaced by the 2022 edition with updated control set (Annex A).
applicable_areas: Global, organizations in the process of transitioning certification.

description: A privacy extension to ISO/IEC 27001. Provides requirements and guidance for a Privacy Information Management System (PIMS), acting as PII controllers/processors.
coverage: Privacy Controls, PII Management, Data Subject Rights, Alignment with GDPR/CCPA
applicable_areas: Organizations subject to global data protection laws (e.g., GDPR), PII Controllers, PII Processors.

description: Provides generic guidelines for implementing and maintaining an effective Enterprise Risk Management (ERM) framework. Non-certifiable guidance standard.
coverage: Risk Management Principles, Framework, Process (Identify, Analyze, Evaluate, Treat)
applicable_areas: Global, all types of organizations for all forms of risk (financial, strategic, security, operational).

description: The first edition of the risk management guidelines. Revised in 2018 for greater emphasis on leadership and integration.
Provides guidance on managing information security risks to support the overall requirements of an ISO/IEC 27001 ISMS.
coverage: Information Security Risk Assessment, Risk Treatment, Risk Scenarios (Event-based/Asset-based)
applicable_areas: Information security professionals, organizations implementing ISO 27001, risk analysts.

description: Former guidance on information security risk management, aligned with ISO/IEC 27001:2013.

full_name: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard
description: A set of security standards designed to ensure that all companies that store, process, or transmit cardholder data maintain a secure environment.
coverage: 12 Core Requirements (e.g., Network Security, Vulnerability Management, Access Control, Continuous Monitoring)
applicable_areas: Financial Services, Merchants, Payment Processors, E-commerce, all entities handling cardholder data.

full_name: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard
description: Previous active version before the major update to v4.0. Retired in March 2024.
applicable_areas: Entities subject to card brand mandates (now required to transition to 4.0/4.0.1).

publisher: AICPA (American Institute of Certified Public Accountants)
version_number: 2017 Trust Services Criteria (with revised Points of Focus - 2022)
description: Reporting on controls at a service organization relevant to one or more of the five Trust Services Criteria (TSC), primarily used for assurance over internal controls.
coverage: Security (Mandatory), Availability, Processing Integrity, Confidentiality, Privacy
applicable_areas: Service Organizations (Cloud Providers, SaaS, Data Centers), Financial Services, Healthcare, Technology.

description: Previous iteration of the Trust Services Criteria (then called Trust Services Principles) before the 2017 update aligned with the COSO framework.
coverage: Security, Availability, Processing Integrity, Confidentiality, Privacy

description: Code of practice focusing on the protection of Personally Identifiable Information (PII) in public cloud environments for PII processors. An extension to ISO/IEC 27002.
coverage: Cloud Privacy Controls, PII Protection, Data Disclosure, Subcontracting of PII Processing
applicable_areas: Public Cloud Service Providers (CSPs) acting as PII Processors.

description: The first edition, containing the same core guidance, but with minor editorial corrections made in the 2019 revision.
coverage: Cloud Privacy Controls, PII Protection in the Cloud

description: Framework for the Governance and Management of Enterprise Information and Technology (EGIT). Defines 40 core objectives and design factors for tailoring governance systems.
coverage: Enterprise Governance, Audit, Risk Management, Security, Performance Measurement, Strategic Alignment
applicable_areas: Enterprise-level organizations of all industries, IT and Business Management.

description: Integrated multiple ISACA frameworks into one model, based on 5 principles and 7 enablers.
